answerText: Harlow Shapley and Heber Curtis[10] Walter Baade's observations of Andromeda led him to use metallicity to classify stars in this fashion.
heading: STIMPY |2015 | Penn A | 12 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Answer some questions about the Andromeda galaxy. For 10 points each: [10] Edwin Hubble first determined that Andromeda was indeed a separate galaxy and not a nebula within the Milky Way, thus ending the "Great Debate" between these two astronomers.
